Text: ReG Sorry not to respond until today I was in SA yesterday I meant to ask you if were going for one or two nights Now that I see you plan to stay only Sat night Ill see if I can go Where are youwe spending the night George called and left me a message that the email address on my card wasnt workinglooks like it worked for you Ill talk to the wife today about going what time on Sat were you thinking about going Talk you ya E
Resounds good I can probably swing a hr reprieve Ill confirm with you later today Do we have a place to stay or are you getting a room E

Rewhen you get a chance send me Paul Bs email addressweb site info Ive got some digital pictures to send him Had a good time with you this weekend bud lets hook up again when you want to go car shopping E

Re Picturegot a great looking family he looks exactly the same Ill have to check out his website and send him some pictures Yeah that Acura has won every SUV comparison that Ive read Ill try to find the online versions on the articles and send them to you You might want to look up the Toyota Highlander too smaller but pretty nice as well Later E

Re Picturean automotive site that I like wwwEdmundscom Check out the Acura MDX by selecting Road Tests New Vehicles select Acura select MDX nice writeup and pictures Sent you a review by Car and Driver separately did you get it E

HOTEL RESERVATIONS IN AUSTINI booked the reservation below through my FritoLay travel agency I think I can probably book you another room at the same rate if youd like This is for the Marriott Capital for a night The Sheraton rooms would have been but they were sold out The Marriott is actually closer to the reception blocks than the Sheraton so well be able to walk over Let me know and Ill try to get another room Ern Forwarded by Ernie J ZavaletaFritoLayUS on PM Mary Ramsey PM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject HOTEL RESERVATIONS IN AUSTIN SALES PERSON ITINERARY DATE FEB CUSTOMER NBR P XFIONO PAGE TO FRITO LAY PEPSI ERNIE ZAVALETA GLENBOROUGH DT SUITE HOUSTON TX FOR ZAVALETAERNIE REF FRIT HOTEL MAR AUSTIN MARRIOTT HOTELS SAT MARRIOTT AUSTIN CAPITAL EAST TH STREET AUSTIN TX FONE FAX NIGHT ROOM OUTMAR LEISURE RATE RATEUSD PER NIGHT CANCEL BY P DAY OF ARRIVAL GUARANTEED LATE ARRIVAL CONFIRMATION RQST KING BED NON SMOKING OTHER JUN AUSTIN SUN THA NK YOU FOR CALLING TRAMEX TRAVELMARY IMPORTANT AIRLINE SECURITY REQUEST A MINUTES FOR CHECKIN GOVERNMENT ISSUED PHOTO ID IS REQUIRED BY AIRLINE ITINERARY COMMENTS AIRFARES ARE PER PERSON AND SUBJ TO CHANGE UNTIL TKTD PLEASE REVIEW ITINERARY IMMEDIATELY UPON RECEIPT IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS CONTACT THE LEISURE TRAVEL DEPARTMENT BY EMAIL OR PHONE OR MONFRI AP CST OR CONTACT YOUR AIRLINE DIRECT FOR EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE Mary Ramsey CTA Tramex Travel Leisure Department

Re HOTEL RESERVATIONS IN AUSTINtry to book both on my card then we can just transfer to yours upon arrival Ill try it now and let you know what happens E Yeah I think the Acura looks even better in person Ive only seen one but it caught me eye

Re HOTEL RESERVATIONS IN AUSTINCan I book one more room at this rate on this reservation same card number for a total of two rooms The second will be a nonsmaking king size as well Thank you Ernie Mary Ramsey PM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject HOTEL RESERVATIONS IN AUSTIN SALES PERSON ITINERARY DATE FEB CUSTOMER NBR P XFIONO PAGE TO FRITO LAY PEPSI ERNIE ZAVALETA GLENBOROUGH DT SUITE HOUSTON TX FOR ZAVALETAERNIE REF FRIT HOTEL MAR AUSTIN MARRIOTT HOTELS SAT MARRIOTT AUSTIN CAPITAL EAST TH STREET AUSTIN TX FONE FAX NIGHT ROOM OUTMAR LEISURE RATE RATEUSD PER NIGHT CANCEL BY P DAY OF ARRIVAL GUARANTEED LATE ARRIVAL CONFIRMATION RQST KING BED NON SMOKING OTHER JUN AUSTIN SUN THA NK YOU FOR CALLING TRAMEX TRAVELMARY IMPORTANT AIRLINE SECURITY REQUEST A MINUTES FOR CHECKIN GOVERNMENT ISSUED PHOTO ID IS REQUIRED BY AIRLINE ITINERARY COMMENTS AIRFARES ARE PER PERSON AND SUBJ TO CHANGE UNTIL TKTD PLEASE REVIEW ITINERARY IMMEDIATELY UPON RECEIPT IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS CONTACT THE LEISURE TRAVEL DEPARTMENT BY EMAIL OR PHONE OR MONFRI AP CST OR CONTACT YOUR AIRLINE DIRECT FOR EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE Mary Ramsey CTA Tramex Travel Leisure Department

Re Warning could not send message for past hoursthis earlier email to Paul bounced back Do I appear to have the right email address Thanks Mail Delivery Subsystem PM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject Warning could not send message for past hours THIS IS A WARNING MESSAGE ONLY YOU DO NOT NEED TO RESEND YOUR MESSAGE The original message was received at Tue Feb GMT from dnsmailfleetnavymil The following addresses had transient nonfatal errors Transcript of session follows Deferred Connection reset by johnpauljonesnavymil Warning message still undelivered after hours Will keep trying until message is weeks oldSee attached file ATTTXT See attached file MSGRTFSee attached file MvcsjpgSee attached file MvcsjpgSee attached file MvcsjpgSee attached file MvcsjpgSee attached file MvcsjpgSee attached file Mvcsjpg ATTTXT MSGRTF Mvcsjpg Mvcsjpg Mvcsjpg Mvcsjpg Mvcsjpg Mvcsjpg
Re Warning could not send message for past hoursIll try it

nd Hotel Room ConfirmationGood news we were able to get the second room at the same rate Below youll see two separate confirmation numbers I dont think it matters which one you or I use When you check in just claim one of them Theyre both on my card so you can transfer to yours at checkin Im not sure what time well get there since well be coming from SA I estimate well get there at about the wedding is at right Well actually be traveling to SA on Friday since some of Jills family from the Valley will be there as well If were not in contact before then lets just plan on meeting at the hotel sometime between and We can drive over to the wedding together from there In case you didnt know theyre registered at Dillards we got him a gift yesterday still plenty of items on the list E Forwarded by Ernie J ZavaletaFritoLayUS on PM Suzanne Mercer AM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject nd Hotel Room Confirmation TO FRITO LAY PEPSI ERNIE ZAVALETA GLENBOROUGH DT SUITE HOUSTON TX FOR ZAVALETAERNIE REF FRIT HOTEL MAR AUSTIN MARRIOTT HOTELS SAT MARRIOTT AUSTIN CAPITAL EAST TH STREET AUSTIN TX FONE FAX NIGHT ROOM OUTMAR LEISURE RATE RATEUSD PER NIGHT CANCEL BY P DAY OF ARRIVAL GUARANTEED LATE ARRIVAL CONFIRMATION RQST KING BED NON SMOKING HOTEL AUSTIN MARRIOTT HOTELS MARRIOTT AUSTIN CAPITAL EAST TH STREET AUSTIN TX FONE FAX NIGHT ROOM OUTMAR LEISURE RATE RATEUSD PER NIGHT CANCEL BY P DAY OF ARRIVAL GUARANTEED LATE ARRIVAL CONFIRMATION RQT NONSMOKING IMPORTANT AIRLINE SECURITY REQUEST A MINUTES FOR CHECKIN GOVERNMENT ISSUED PHOTO ID IS REQUIRED BY AIRLINE ITINERARY COMMENTS AIRFARES ARE PER PERSON AND SUBJ TO CHANGE UNTIL TKTD PLEASE REVIEW ITINERARY IMMEDIATELY UPON RECEIPT IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS CONTACT THE LEISURE TRAVEL DEPARTMENT BY EMAIL OR PHONE OR MONFRI AP CST OR CONTACT YOUR AIRLINE DIRECT FOR EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE

Any Plans tonightwhats going on My brotherinlaw and a friend of his are flying into town tonight Were going to head over to Gilians sp a place that is supposed to be like Dave Busters Well prob get there at about We thought wed hang there for a while and then head to the downtown area and find dome kind of bar A couple of other friends of mine from Bschool will be joining us I thought you might want to as well Are you game Write back or give me a call H cell Im leaving work in a few minutes if I dont respond to any email later E PM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject Re nd Hotel Room Confirmation Ernie Thanks for taking care of that I will probably be getting into Austin earlier than you Ill have my cell phone with me If you get into town earlier give me a call Otherwise why dont you just call me at the room when you get to the hotel Sounds great well ride over together I might bring this girl I have kinda been seeing with me My latest victim Well see I believe thats correct Re Any Plans tonighthad a decent time out on Friday We went to Jilians for a while then over to Slick WIllies at Bayou Place to play pool We finished out at some jazz club the Red Cat it was pretty cool I then went to the motocross races Sat night which were actually pretty exciting we had great seats close to the action so that helped Sorry we missed you we need to hook up the next time I get a pass Yeah Ive got Enron on my list of stocks that I track been getting hit hard lately as has most of the market My little k is getting drilled but Im buying as much as I can right now mostly the big techs Itll take a while for these rate cuts and tax cuts to toake effect but when they do Havent heard from George yet either I concur with your assessement hell need a month or two to snap put of it Later E AM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject Re Any Plans tonight Hey Ernie Sorry I didnt get back with you Friday I left a little early so I must have just missed your message Did you guys have a good time on Friday night How is everything going It has actually been thick around here Worked several late nights last week to try and get caught up I may have to delay the purchase of the new car with Enrons stock taking a hit lately It did gain some points on Friday and early today Hopefully it keeps it up Talked to George since his wedding Havent heard anything out of him since Probably just overcome by marital bliss Zavaleta Ernie ErnieJ ri To tolaycom cc Subject Any Plans tonight PM Hey whats going on My brotherinlaw and a friend of his are flying into town tonight Were GTs emailNonPrivilegedpst Hey G Havent heard from you whats going on Things are same ol here at work am going on vacation to San Antonio next week Hey Im going to be in Austin tomorrow for work and am planning to play golf in the afternoon I plan to play at a course that is towards Houston on and since George works out there somewhere I thought he might be able to join in Do you have his email andor phone numbers workhome Have you been playing any golf We got a new analyst here at work from UT and hes got got fever He got me to play last Friday my first time in Houston and now Ive got the fever again My wife is not thrilled but So if you play at all we should hook up Thanks E AM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject Re Any Plans tonight Hey Ernie Sorry I didnt get back with you RE GTs emailNonPrivilegedpst Thanks for the address I emailed Paul shortly after he emailed us and it seemed to get through But I havent sent anything lately Gotta keep that pipeline filled Ill call you on golf the next time I get to go here in Houston Take it easy E PM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject RE GTs email Hey E Good to hear from you again Not much new around here Working and partying Still trying to restock the girlfriend pipeline Georges email is I havent played any golf recently but do like to play I am pretty horrible but it is fun nonetheless I would definetly be up for a round some time Let me know Have you been able to email Bieraugel at the last address he sent I have tried but my emails keep getting bounced back to me Original Message From Zavaleta Ernie from UT and hes got got fever He got me to play last Friday my first time in Houston and now Ive got the fever again My wife is not thrilled but So if you play at all we should hook up Thanks E AM To Enron StockNonPrivilegedpst I probably should have picked your brain first but I bought some stock today I think the punding you guys have taken is getting a little carried away now While there is uncertainty over Skilling leaving I think your guys fundamental position is still excellent Cant say I bought enough to help turn it around but I hope there are others who feel as I do Anything new going on Pretty much the same ol here Just about to go into my busy planning period SeptNov so not looking forward to that much Kids are doing well and two of my three start preschool next week so RE Enron StockNonPrivilegedpst yeah Im a buyandhold kind of guy so I can be patient for the transition Id definitely do my best to get a pass for a game if you ever have an opening Dont want to get my hopes up with the preseason rankings but it would be cool to see a vs matchup OU weekend Have you heard from George I never got a response from the email I sent him a few weeks ago PM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject RE Enron Stock I think your on solid ground I think the stock will stay down for a little while until they name those that will join Lay in the office of the chairman We continue to beat earnings estimates but things like broadband Dahbol and now Skilling put pressure on the stock Not much new going on Just hanging out Working Will be heading to Austin for the game on Sept Lets see if the horns can live up to all the hype I have a pair of season tix for all the home games so I will let you know when I have an extra for the game See if you cant get a hall pass from your better half Original Message From Zavaleta Ernie ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESZavaletaCErnieCErnieEJEZavaletafritolayEcomE NRONcom Sent Friday August PM To Nemec Gerald Subject Enron Stock I probably should have picked your brain first but I bought some stock today I think the punding you guys have taken is getting a little carried away now While there is uncertainty over Skilling leaving I think your guys fundamental position is still excellent Cant say I bought enough to help turn it around but I hope there are others who feel as I do Anything new going on Pretty much the same ol here Just about to go into my busy planning period SeptNov so not looking forward to that much Kids are doing well and two of my three start preschool next week so mama is relieved Take care E AM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject Re Any Plans tonight Hey Ernie Sorry I didnt get back with you Friday I left a little early so I must have just missed your message Did you guys have a good time on Friday night How is everything going It has actually been thick around here Worked several late nights last week to try and get caught up I may have to delay the purchase of the new car with Enrons stock taking a hit lately It did gain some points on Friday and early today Hopefully it keeps it up Talked to George since his wedding Havent heard anything out of him since Probably just overcome by marital bliss Zavaleta Ernie ErnieJ ri To tolaycom cc Subject Any Plans tonight PM Hey whats going on My brotherinlaw and a friend of his are flying into town tonight Were going to head over to Gilians sp a place that is supposed to be like Dave Busters Well prob get there at about We thought wed hang there for a while and then head to the downtown area and find dome kind of bar A couple of other friends of mine from Bschool will be joining us I thought you might want to as well Are you game Write back or give me a call H cell Im leaving work in a few minutes if I dont respond to any email later E PM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject Re nd Hotel Room Confirmation Ernie Thanks for taking care of that I will probably be getting into Austin earlier than you Ill have my cell phone with me If you get into town earlier give me a call Otherwise why dont you just call me at the room when you get to the hotel Sounds great well ride over together I might bring this girl I have kinda been seeing with me My latest victim Well see I believe thats correct The wedding is at Thanks for the Dilliards tip I was going to ask about that G ErnieJ r itolaycom To cc PM Subject nd Hotel Room Confirmation Gerald Good news we were able to get the second room at the same rate Below youll see two separate confirmation numbers I dont think it matters which one you or I use When you check in just claim one of them Theyre both on my card so you can transfer to yours at checkin Im not sure what time well get there since well be coming from SA I estimate well get there at about the wedding is at right Well actually be traveling to SA on Friday since some of Jills family from the Valley will be there as well If were not in contact before then lets just plan on meeting at the hotel sometime between and We can drive over to the wedding together from there In case you didnt know theyre registered at Dillards we got him a gift yesterday still plenty of items on the list E RE Still here and still readyHey Geraldo It would be great to see Paul go far in his Navy career the military can use more guys of his caliber I had not seen the writings on the bombs thats great Im sure those guys are motivated to do their jobs well Wow thats great news about Sharon This is her first right My sister is now engaged She and her fiance moved into an apartment off of Memorial Drive Hes an engineer UT grad as well civil engineering I think and works for Chicago Bridge Iron So we are relieved she hooked up with a good guy Shes going on so yes its kind of wierd to see your little sister growing up before your eyes We definitely need to get you out to the house We just had laminate wood and tile flooring put in to part of the house so its a bit more presentable now The cheapo original carpet was getting pretty trashed My kids are getting big fast theyre a lot of work but getting to be a lot of fun too All the talk arouond the house is of Hallloween theyre looking forward to it OK bud gotta get a presentation ready for a meeting this am Lets hook up soon EZ AM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject RE Still here and still ready Ernie I think thats right It makes sense since he is Chief Weapons Officer Bieraugel is one smart dude He helped me through many an engineering class Wouldnt be surprised to see Admiral Bieraugel one day Did you see on CNN how the Navy guys are writing For NYPD and FDNY on the bombs being dropped in Afghan Eat that Yep Saturday was pretty depressing I have to hand it to OU Stoops is an outstanding coach I will still go to the games though some of the luster is lost How is the family doing My little sister Sharon had a little boy yesterday William Boone Pretty weird when your little sister starts having babies We still need to get together when we get a chance Let me know when you get some time G Original Message From ENRON Sent Tuesday October AM To Nemec Gerald Subject Still here and still ready Gerald Does LCDR mean Lieutenant Commander On my last email his title was LT just lieutenant I guess that means our boy has been promoted The Horns werent too impressive on SatI was going to go to the Colorado game but I think I might skip now seems like the whole season is shot Forwarded by Ernie J ZavaletaFritoLayUS on AM LCDR Bieraugel PM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject Still here and still ready Amigos I cant say anything about what we are doing out here I will tell you thisthe President told the military to be ready We are I appreciate the kind thoughts and words Were keeping the faith out here Take care Paul This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use RE Enron StockMan I thought it was your job to keep these offbalancesheet deals clean I thought we had seen the bottom yesterday but I guess the market is anticipating additional debt downgrades I bought in at and am considering the ol Texas doubledown get my average price down to but even that looks shaky at the moment I trust that you guys will pull through Whats going on Have you hooked up with George at any UT games Wonder how married life is treating him havent heard from him Havent heard from Paul since our last email have you Take care Ern PM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay cc Subject RE Enron Stock I think your on solid ground I think the stock will stay down for a little while until they name those that will join Lay in the office of the chairman We continue to beat earnings estimates but things like broadband Dahbol and now Skilling put pressure on the stock Not much new going on Just hanging out Working Will be heading to Austin for the game on Sept Lets see if the horns can live up to all the hype I have a pair of season tix for all the home games so I will let you know when I have an extra for the game See if you cant get a hall pass from your better half Re Dudes Cc Lt Bieraugel I doubt you are able to receive email at this time but just in case you arewanted to let you know that you are making the news Just read an article in the USA Today online that lists your ship as one in the Arabian Sea that has launched Tomahawks So Im bragging about you to everyone in my officeMy buddy Paul as Chief Weapon Officer is lobbing missiles at the Taliban hes pushing the button himself I know you guys are welltrained and just doing your job but your college buddies are proud of you and the entire country is behind you approve the actions in a poll So God bless and Godspeed you get back safely to those four kids of yours Take care bud Ern LT Bieraugel PM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay Gerald Nemec Email cc Subject Dudes Ernie and Gerald well dudes were doing just what we said we were not going to do Fall out of touch again Here is the latest I am out on my ship for six months now We left June th and we get back in November Its a bitch to be gone from the family for that long but it very busy so it goes fast for me We had our fourth and probably last kid on May th Her name is Chloe Elizabeth She is perfect My two year old Kate was very surprised when we brought her home Carson said he wanted a brother and Kelly wants to hold her all the time You can check some pictures out at wwwgeocitiescompbieraugel Take it easy you guys and stay in touch Paul

Re Dudes Cc NonPrivilegedpst Youre right we need to do better at keeping in touch Gerald and I live in the same town and we still hardly see each other Great to hear from you I know its got to be the hardest thing to leave for six months especially with the new baby when mama needs you the most Do you guys have any family in town at least Youre wife is probably involved with a network of military wifes at least Its hard for me to leave for even a couple of days The week after next I am in Dallas for a week of training thatll be the longest Ive been away Well my wife just went to the movies with my oldest Sophie shes four Im home with my two boys who are both napping so I actually have a minute to write I am about to make lunch for my neighbor who is from South Africa His family just left for SA for two months so Ill probably have him over often Were about to cook some Elgin sausage remmeber where that is Paul I was in Austin for work on Friday drove there and stopped to get some The road trip was quite eventful saw a few wreck and one car was even on fire You probably dont catch national weather Paul but we just had a onceinacentury storm here in Houston thats what theyre calling it on the news anyway Some places in the Houston area had of rain in the last two days We had about in my area no flooding though Gerald how did you fare So weve been declares a natural disaster area and all of that Other than that not a whole lot going on Work is going well I got promoted in Feb and am in line for another in August so I cant complain FritoLay is a good stable company that treats its employees well Lets see what else just got a new car that I am excited about I had a little Ford Focus spd for my comuter car but got tired of all of the shifting in traffic on the Beltway So I found a Buick Regal GSE with only k on it in immaculate shape I know a Buick sounds kinda lame but as far as Buicks go this the only one I would own It has leather sunrfoor sporty wheels killer watt stereo with a HP supercharged engine with room for to boot I loaded up the family and cargo to go to the Valley during Memorial Day it even got MPG Beats the hell out of the or so in the Suburban with gas prices these days Gerald are you still in the market for a SUV I think you were interested in the Toyota Sequoia or the Acura MDX Youd better just stick with the series Bimmer I know I would if I were in your shoes OK guys gotta get to cookin those sausages Bieraugel hang in the there out at sea and keep us proud Ern LT Bieraugel PM To Ernie J ZavaletaFrito ritoLay Gerald
